categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Chivas was a senior Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. A Force-sensitive, Chivas received training in the ways of the Force at the Coruscant Jedi Temple's academy. Soon after the battle at Kothlis, Padawan Chivas joined fellow apprentice Ahsoka Tano as part of Green team in a competition arranged by Jedi Master Taria Damsin. The competition, taking place in the new Sublevel nineteen training dojo, ended in a tie. During the trial, Chivas managed to take out two modified B1-Series battle droid as Green team crossed a river. Chivas was one of the two members of Green Team to make it all the way through the dojo.
